name: WonderWoman Steampunk Corset
description:
Wonder Woman steampunk steel boned corset

MADE FOR BUYER

PLEASE LEAVE YOUR MEASUREMENTS AT CHECKOUT


Standard length to give fantastic coverage, a totally flat stomach, awesome bust uplift and excellent posture.
This corset comes down over the waist and ends just above the hips for totally free movement and no restriction. The bust is a sweetheart shape for fantastic bust shaping, and is higher backed to avoid and displacement of fat in that area-this is a very flattering shape on all sizes, bust measurements and shapes. 

This corset, like all our others, is fully steel boned and laces up the back-this baby will take up to 4 inches off your waist, give you a fantastic hourglass shape, create curves that you didn't know you had and lift your bust to new buxom heights! 


Please note that your actual waist measurement is taken approximately 2inch above the navel, where the waist is at the smallest.

If you are unsure of whether this is the right size for you please contact me and I will help in any way I can. 


TO MEASURE:
AROUND THE BUST-Measure around the fullest point while wearing your best fitting, non-padded bra. Hold the tape measure firmly
UNDER THE BUST-Measure at bra band level under the bust, around the ribcage, holding firmly.
WAIST-Measure at the very smallest point (usually about 2 or 3 inches above the belly button) and hold the tape measure as tightly as you can-not cutting into the skin, but as firmly as possible
HIPS-Measure at hip bone level and around the fullest part of the hip. Hold the tape measure snugly against the skin but not digging in.

wonder woman steampunk steel boned corset

name: Vivienne Circus Corset
description:
Vivienne steel boned corset

MADE FOR BUYER TO FIT YOU


NEW STYLE!

THE STRIPED JACKET IS AVAILABLE SEPARATELY IN OUR STORE.

Vivienne circus steel boned corset

Made up of alternating black and white satin panels, with blood red boning and binding.

Longline style corset to give fantastic coverage, a totally flat stomach, awesome bust uplift and excellent posture.
This corset comes down over the hips and to a point at the front, and curves over and up into a point and either side of the bust-this creates a streamlined, sleek look and gives great bust coverage and really makes the best of any bust size at all. 

This corset, like all our others, is fully steel boned and laces up the back-this baby will take up to 4 inches off your waist, give you a fantastic hourglass shape, create curves that you didn't know you had and lift your bust to knew buxom heights! 

THIS CORSET WILL BE MADE TO FIT YOU AND TO YOUR MEASUREMENTS.
PLEASE PROVIDE YOUR NATURAL BUST, WAIST AND HIP MEASUREMENTS.

Please note that your actual waist measurement is taken approximately 2inch above the navel, where the waist is at the smallest.

name: Black and White Circus Bustle Skirt
description:
Black and white striped skirt

This skirt is awesome for a number of reasons:
1. It's 100% cotton so lovely and soft (and breathable), and very light weight
2.It can be washed as any other garment would be, and over time will wear into a soft and weathered look
3. It's full enough to fit up to a 50" waist without losing its gather
4. It's full length and has enough pleats to be worn on it's own or with another skirt
5. And this is the best one-it has long ribbons stitched into the waistband at the front, which can be wrapped under and over the front of the skirt, and used to bustle up the front as shown in the pictures!

This skirt can be worn as a simple long, full skirt, or with the use of the ribbons, can be bustled up.
This skirt looks amazing when bustle and gives a real psycho circus/old western feel when bustled up, and it's as easy as pulling the ribbons around and tying in a bow-no faffing with pins, needles or thread to bustle this up.
It can be worn at any bustle height you fancy, and the higher the front is bustled up, the more the back pulls in to give fantastic gathering and shape.
It also looks equally awesome worn cheekily on its own (perhaps with stockings and lace up boots showing underneath), or with another skirt layered underneath. 

Made in a full length style, 39" total length and designed to fit any waist size at all. Made with a drawstring waist to tie at the back for the best fit.

This does of course look fantastic when teamed with one of our corsets, and can be worn in many different ways, creating so many different looks.

The red skirt and the black corset are for sale separately in our shop. 

Fancy something plainer or in a different colour?
Convo me and I can make this up for you in a fabric of your choice.

name: White Peasant Blouse
description:
White peasant blouse

These blouses are meant to fit close to the body to give a soft, comfortable fit under our corsets or with our skirts.


Best worn as shown with one of our corsets and skirts.

Made from a soft white poly cotton with stretch for a close fit, making this sleek and not at all bulky under a corset and/or skirt . Elasticated at the sleeves and bustline for a sleek and closer fit in these areas.

The bustline on this blouse is a soft square shape for cleavage-attractiveness while maintaining some dignity.

name: Steampunk Victorian stripe jacket
description:
Steampunk victorian stripe silk taffeta and velvet jacket


The jacket is made from an absolutely amazing silk taffeta and black velvet fabric which is one of the most expensive fabrics I've used in recent years.The jacket is a cropped length with mini stand up collar. It has puffed shoulders with full length sleeves and pleats at the wrist. The jacket fastens under the bust and is open across the front of the bust, just covering the sides, so will fit any bust size while providing cover at the sides, insanely flattering on all sizes.Fastens with eyelet and ribbon fastening under the bust.

Will fit any bust size.

Available in size small (UK 8-10), medium (UK 12-14) and large (UK 16-18)

The corset is available separately.
